text: Vi drar till fjällen (Swedish for "We're headin' for the mountains") is a song written by Daniel Bäckström, Stefan Enberg. Marko Kristian Lehtosalo and Hans Schumacher, released as a single on 1 March 1998. The song also appeared on Markoolio's debut studio album "Sticker hårt", released later in 1998. The single topped the Swedish singles chart on 18 February 1999. It also received a Svensktoppen test on 27 February 1999 but failed to enter the chart. Elise and Jemma Myrberg are also featured in the song. ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" !Chart (1999) !Peak position |- |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" !Chart (1999) !Positions |- |Sweden (Sverigetopplistan) |align="center"|10 |} == References == Category:1998 singles Category:Markoolio songs Category:Number-one singles in Sweden Category:Swedish-language songs
title: Vi drar till fjällen
